short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabGenius is a Chrome extension that automatically groups tabs based on their domain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabGenius: Your Smart Tab Manager

Tired of drowning in a sea of open tabs? TabGenius is here to rescue your productivity and sanity! 

Key Features:
• Intelligent tab grouping - automatically organizes your tabs by topic
• One-click tab search - find any tab instantly 
• Tab hibernation - save memory by putting inactive tabs to sleep
• Cross-device sync - access your tabs anywhere
• Customizable keyboard shortcuts - navigate tabs like a pro

TabGenius uses AI to understand your browsing habits and optimize your workflow. Say goodbye to tab overload and hello to a cleaner, more efficient browsing experience.

Perfect for:
• Students juggling research across multiple subjects
• Professionals managing various projects
• Anyone who loves to keep many tabs open

Download TabGenius today and transform your chaotic browser into a productivity powerhouse!

------------
TabGenius: 您的智能标签页管理器

厌倦了被大量打开的标签页淹没?TabGenius来拯救您的工作效率和理智了!

主要功能:
• 智能标签分组 - 自动按主题整理您的标签页
• 一键标签搜索 - 瞬间找到任何标签
• 标签休眠 - 通过使不活跃的标签休眠来节省内存
• 跨设备同步 - 随时随地访问您的标签
• 可自定义快捷键 - 像专业人士一样操作标签

TabGenius运用人工智能理解您的浏览习惯并优化您的工作流程。告别标签页过载,迎接更整洁、更高效的浏览体验。

特别适合:
• 需要在多个学科间进行研究的学生
• 管理各种项目的专业人士
• 任何喜欢保持多个标签页打开的人

立即下载TabGenius,将您混乱的浏览器转变为生产力强大引擎!
